verses.roman:
rātri-kāle mane āmi vicāra karila
sanātana more kibā 'prahelī' kahila

synonyms: rātri-kāle—at night; mane—in the mind; āmi—I; vicāra karila—considered; sanātana—Sanātana; more—unto Me; kibā—what; prahelī—enigma; kahila—spoke.
translation: "At night, however, I considered what Sanātana had told Me.
